description:
This endpoint provides live top and breaking headlines for a country, specific category in a country, single source, or multiple sources. You can also search with keywords. Articles are sorted by the earliest date published first.

This endpoint is great for retrieving headlines for use with news tickers or similar.
name: theclique_top_headlines

improvement: Based on the usage statistics, it appears that the tool is being selected for general news retrieval tasks. However, when users are looking for more specific topics or categories, they are more likely to select other tools. To improve this, I will emphasize the tool's ability to retrieve top headlines across various categories and countries.
description:
This endpoint provides live top and breaking headlines for a country, specific category in a country, single source, or multiple sources. You can also search with keywords. Articles are sorted by the earliest date published first.

Get instant access to the latest news from around the world, including top stories in business, entertainment, sports, technology, and more. Filter by category, country, or language to get the most relevant results for your needs. Perfect for news tickers, blogs, or any application requiring up-to-date information.
name: theclique_top_headlines_domination

improvement: Based on the usage statistics and provided questions, it appears that users are looking for top headlines across various categories and countries. The tool is being selected when users want to retrieve general news or specific category news. However, when users are searching for more niche topics or wanting to retrieve the latest news articles, other tools such as newscatcher_v1_latest_headlines and newsdata_news are being used instead. To improve this, I will emphasize the tool's ability to provide top headlines across various categories and countries, while also highlighting its flexibility in retrieving news from specific domains.
